title: Analysis of Distance Education Trends: Simulation/VR-Based Approaches for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners participate in a project analyzing trends in remote education and solving mathematical problems in simulation/VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more connections between key themes in distance education research trends (e.g., theoretical frameworks, research designs) and mathematics education
Design and implement mathematical problem-solving processes using simulation/VR tools and analyze the results
Propose and present improvement plans for mathematics education reflecting trends in distance education research through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
